issue.title: [R] Add Karl to the contributors list for the pacakge
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13927](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13927). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`[~karldw]` : As recognition of the contributions you have made, especially the herculean effort with ARROW-12981 we would like to add you to the contributors list of the R package. 

If you are ok with this, would you mind giving us the email you would like to have listed there (and ORCID, if you have one and want it there as well)?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13927?focusedCommentId=17411327) by Karl Dunkle Werner (karldw):*
Thank you so much, that would be great!

The email I normally use for development is karldw@users.noreply.github.com, just to cut down on spam. Let me know if you prefer a real email instead. My ORCID is https://orcid.org/0000-0003-0523-7309

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13927?focusedCommentId=17421364) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11256
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11256>
